page.title: 13Heolgerrig Primary School.
page.content: Heolgerrig Primary Schol has got eight classes.We have 1 nursery 3 infants and 4 juniors.We have a field.It is quite big.Thereare gates leading into the field.We have it cut every year and we have lines painted for the tracks when we have our sports. There are about 240 children in our school. Our canteen has what we call the tray system.We line up outside and when we go in we help ourselves to a tray and a knife and fork.When we get to the dinner counter we tell the ladies what we want and they will give it to us .They will also give us our spoon with our desert.Our head teachers name is Mrs.Phillips and our deputy heads name is Mr.Jones. I think that Mrs.Phillips runs the school nicely,and when she is away she can rely on Mr.Jones.
